	Page 7 of 9
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage151"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	EXHIBIT A
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Suite C Premises
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT" ALIGN="CENTER">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/03/22/0001193125-16-513635_G127163EX10116_PG08.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage152"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
<U>
	EXHIBIT B
</U>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Landlord Consent to Fifth Amendment (Synacor)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Waterfront Associates, LLC, as successor by conversion to Waterfront Associates (&#147;
<B>
	Landlord
</B>
	&#148;), is the landlord under the
	Property Lease dated March 13, 1998, with Ludlow Technical Products Corporation, formerly known as Graphic Controls Corporation (&#147;
<B>
	Sublandlord
</B>
	&#148;), as tenant, for that certain building containing approximately 102,816 rentable square
	feet of space and commonly known as Building No. 3, Waterfront Village Center, 40 La Riviere Drive, Buffalo, New York 14202 (the &#147;
<B>
	Building
</B>
	&#148;), which Property Lease was amended by that certain First Amendment to Lease dated April 29,
	1998, that Second Amendment to Lease dated April&nbsp;21, 1999, that Third Amendment to Lease dated July 30, 1999, and that Fourth Amendment to Lease dated December 30, 2007 (as amended, the &#147;
<B>
	Lease
</B>
	&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Under that certain Sublease dated as of March 3, 2006, as amended by that First Amendment to Sublease dated September 25, 2006, that Second
	Amendment to Sublease dated February 27, 2007, that Third Amendment to Sublease dated June 30,2010, and that Fourth Amendment to Sublease dated May 21, 2013 (collectively, the &#147;
<B>
	Sublease
</B>
	&#148;) by and between Sublandlord and Synacor,
	Inc., a Delaware corporation, as subtenant (&#147;
<B>
	Subtenant
</B>
	&#148;), Subtenant subleases a portion of the Building, which portion contains approximately 33,711 rentable square feet of space, is located on the first and third floors of the
	Building, and is defined as the &#147;Premises&#148; in the Sublease.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Subtenant and Sublandlord have now entered into that certain Fifth
	Amendment to Sublease dated as of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;, 2013 (the &#147;
<B>
	Fifth Amendment
</B>
	&#148;). A copy of the Fifth Amendment is attached to this Landlord Consent. Under the Fifth Amendment,
	Subtenant is subleasing an additional 6,284 rentable square feet of space located on the first floor of the Building (the &#147;
<B>
	Suite C Premises
</B>
	&#148;), which Suite C Premises is more particularly described in the Fifth Amendment.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Landlord hereby acknowledges and agrees that it has received and reviewed a copy of the Fifth Amendment. After review, Landlord consents to
	the provisions of the enclosed Fifth Amendment. Further, Landlord hereby waives any rights Landlord or its designee may have under Section 14.05 of the Lease to terminate the Lease with respect to the Suite C Premises, to sublease the Suite C
	Premises, or to otherwise recapture the Suite C Premises. This Landlord Consent shall not be deemed to constitute consent by the undersigned to any subletting other than that described in the Fifth Amendment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_5"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.11.7
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	SIXTH AMENDMENT
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	TO
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	SUBLEASE
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	THIS SIXTH AMENDMENT TO
	SUBLEASE (this &#147;
<B>
	Amendment
</B>
	&#148;) is made and entered as of this 8
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of February, 2016 (the &#147;Effective Date&#148;) by and between
<B>
	COVIDIEN LP
</B>
	, a Delaware limited
	partnership, as successor in interest to Ludlow Technical Products Corporation, a New York corporation formerly known as Graphic Controls Corporation (&#147;
<B>
	Sublandlord
</B>
	&#148;), and
<B>
	SYNACOR, INC
</B>
	., a Delaware corporation
	(&#147;
<B>
	Subtenant
</B>
	&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	WITNESSETH:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	A.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Sublandlord is the tenant under that certain Property Lease dated March&nbsp;13, 1998, with Waterfront Associates, LLC (&#147;Landlord&#148;), as landlord, covering Building No. 3, Waterfront Village Center, 40 La
	Riviere Drive, Buffalo, New York 14202 (the &#147;Building&#148;), as amended by that certain First Amendment to Lease dated April&nbsp;29,1998, that Second Amendment to Lease dated April&nbsp;21, 1999, that Third Amendment to Lease dated
	July&nbsp;30, 1999, and that Fourth Amendment to Lease dated December&nbsp;30, 2007 (collectively, the Property Lease and amendments thereto are the &#147;Lease&#148;).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	B.
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Under the terms and conditions of that certain Sublease dated as of March&nbsp;3,2006 (the &#147;
<B>
	Original Sublease
</B>
	&#148;), as amended by that certain First Amendment to Sublease (&#147;
<B>
	First
	Amendment
</B>
	&#148;) dated September&nbsp;25, 2006, that certain Second Amendment to Sublease (&#147;
<B>
	Second Amendment
</B>
	&#148;) dated February&nbsp;27, 2007, that certain Third Amendment to Sublease (&#147;
<B>
	Third Amendment
</B>
	&#148;) dated
	June&nbsp;30, 2010, that certain Fourth Amendment to Sublease (&#147;
<B>
	Fourth Amendment
</B>
	&#148;) dated May&nbsp;21, 2013 and that certain Fifth Amendment to Sublease (&#147;
<B>
	Fifth Amendment
</B>
	&#148;) dated July&nbsp;10, 2013 (collectively, the
	&#147;Sublease&#148;), Subtenant subleased from Sublandlord approximately 45,056 rentable square feet of space located on the first and third floors of the Building (the &#147;
<B>
	Existing Premises
</B>
	&#148;), which Existing Premises is more
	particularly described in the Sublease as the Premises.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	C. The Term of the Sublease expires on
	March&nbsp;31, 2016 and Sublandlord and Subtenant desire to extend the Term of the Sublease.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:4%; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	D. In addition, Subtenant
	also desires to vacate and surrender to Sublandlord, the space located on the first floor of the Building effective March&nbsp;31, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	NOW THEREFORE, in consideration of the mutual covenants set forth herein, and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and
	sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged, Sublandlord and Subtenant agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<U>
	ARTICLE I
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<U>
	EXTENSION OF TERM
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	1
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage154"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 1.1
<U>
	Commencement Date
</U>
	. The extended term (the &#147;Extension Term&#148;) of this
	Sublease shall commence April&nbsp;1, 2016, and the Extension Term shall expire upon the Expiration Date (hereinafter defined).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section
	1.2
<U>
	Expiration Date
</U>
	. Subject to the terms, covenants, or conditions of the Sublease and the Early Termination provision set forth in Section 1.3 of this Amendment, the Extension Term shall end on the earlier of: (a) December&nbsp;31,2017, or
	(b) five days before the expiration or earlier termination, for any reason whatsoever, of the Lease. The date of expiration of this Sublease shall be referred to herein as the &#147;Expiration Date.&#148;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 1.3
<U>
	Early Termination by Subtenant
</U>
	. Provided that Subtenant is not in default at the time Subtenant delivers notice, Subtenant
	may, at its sole option, terminate the Sublease effective as of June&nbsp;30, 2017 (the &#147;Cancellation Date&#148;). To exercise such termination right, Subtenant must no later than March&nbsp;31, 2017, give notice thereof to Sublandlord together
	with Subtenant&#146;s payment to Sublandlord of $30,808.00 (the &#147;Cancellation Fee&#148;) in lawful money of the United States of America. As a condition to the effectiveness of Subtenant&#146;s termination right, Subtenant shall pay to
	Sublandlord prior to the Cancellation Date any past-due amounts then outstanding under the Sublease. If Subtenant fails timely to deliver the Cancellation Fee or the cancellation notice or is otherwise unable to comply with or exercise this
	cancellation option, then Subtenant&#146;s right to cancel the Sublease .Time is of the essence with respect thereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 1.4
<U>
	Month to Month Extension
</U>
	. Provided that Subtenant is not in default at the time Subtenant delivers notice, Subtenant may extend this Sublease on a month to month basis beyond the Expiration Date, but in no event beyond October&nbsp;31, 2018.
	To exercise such extension right, Subtenant must no later than November&nbsp;30, 2017, give notice thereof to Sublandlord. During any such extension of the Sublease beyond the Expiration Date, either Sublandlord or Subtenant may terminate this
	Sublease at the end of any calendar month by giving the other party sixty days prior written notice of such termination.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	ARTICLE 2
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<U>
	EXTENSION AS TO A PORTION OF
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<U>
	THE PREMISES ONLY
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section
	2.1
<U>
	Extension Premises
</U>
	. The Extension Term shall only apply to that portion of the Existing Premises located on the third floor of the Building in which the Existing Premises are located as set forth on the attached Exhibit A (the
	&#147;Extension Premises&#148;). Subtenant and Sublandlord agree that the Extension Premises contain 30,808 square feet and, that Subtenant will vacate and surrender to Sublandlord, all other portions of the Existing Premises as of March&nbsp;31,
	2016. Thereafter, Subtenant&#146;s Share, as defined in Section 1.1 (i) of the Sublease shall be 29.96%, which is the percentage obtained by dividing the number of rentable square feet in the Extension Premises (30,808) by the number of rentable
	square feet in the Building (102,816).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 2.2
<U>
	AS-IS Condition of Premises
</U>
	. Subtenant accepts the Extension Premises
	&#147;AS-IS&#148; in its presently existing condition, and Sublandlord shall not be required to perform any demolition work or tenant-finish work therein or to provide any allowances therefor.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage155"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 2.3
<U>
	Subtenant&#146;s Improvements
</U>
	. Subtenant may perform improvements in the
	Extension Premises subject to compliance with all of the terms, conditions and requirements of the Lease and the Sublease.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 2.4
<U>
	Parking
</U>
	. Sublandlord and Subtenant agree that Section 9(a) of the Fourth Amendment is hereby amended by deleting the phrase &#147;one hundred and fifty five (155)&#148; and inserting the phrase &#147;one hundred and twenty-five (125)&#148; in
	its place.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	ARTICLE 3
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<U>
	RENT
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 3.1
<U>
	Adjustment to Fixed Rent
</U>
	. Fixed Rent due during the Extension Term in the amount of shall be payable in equal
	monthly installments of $30,808.00 each for the period commencing upon the Commencement Date of the Extension Term and expiring on the Expiration Date, subject to Sections 1.3 and 1.4 hereof. Should the Sublease Term be extended on a month to month
	basis pursuant to Section 1.4 hereof, monthly installments of Fixed Rent in the amount of $30,808.00 shall continue to be paid by Subtenant to Sublandlord until such time as the Sublease is terminated.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 3.2
<U>
	Security Deposit
</U>
	. On or before April&nbsp;30,2016, Sublandlord shall pay to the Subtenant the sum of $16,622.66 which
	represents a refund of the Security Deposit previously paid by Subtenant to Sublandlord for that portion of the Existing Premises located on the first floor of the Building which will be surrendered and vacated by Subtenant on or before
	March&nbsp;31, 2016.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 3.3
<U>
	Payment of Rent
</U>
	. All Rent payments due to Sublandlord under the Sublease shall be made to:
	Covidien LP, Attn: Global Real Estate, 710 Medtronic Pkwy. MS LS-120, Minneapolis, MN 55432
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	ARTICLE 4
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<U>
	BROKERAGE
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 4.1
<U>
	Representation and Indemnification
</U>
	. Sublandlord and Subtenant each warrant to the other that in the negotiation of this Sixth Amendment to Sublease they dealt with no real estate broker or salesman except Pyramid Brokerage Company/Cushman
	Wakefield and CB Richard Ellis Buffalo NY, LLC. Sublandlord shall compensate such broker pursuant to a separate agreement. Except as otherwise set forth herein, each of Subtenant and Sublandlord shall indemnify the other against all costs, expenses,
	attorneys&#146; fees, and other liability for commissions or other compensation claimed by any other broker or agent.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	ARTICLE 5
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<U>
	NOTICES
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage156"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 5.1 Notices. Any notice, demand, consent, approval, direction, agreement or
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	other communication required or permitted hereunder or under any other documents in connection herewith to Sublandlord shall be in writing and shall be
	directed as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Covidien LP
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	710 Medtronic Parkway
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Minneapolis, MN 55432-5604
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; MARGIN-LEFT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Attn:
	Real Estate Dept. MS LS-120
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	ARTICLE 6
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<U>
	MISCELLANEOUS TERMS
</U>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 6.1
<U>
	Ratification
</U>
	. Subtenant and Sublandlord hereby ratify and confirm their respective rights and obligations under the
	Sublease, and represent and warrant to the other that they each have no defenses thereto.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 6.2
<U>
	Binding Effect: Governing Law: Recitals
</U>
	.
	Except as modified hereby, the Sublease shall remain in full effect, and the Sublease and this Sixth Amendment shall be binding upon the Sublandlord and Subtenant and their successors and assigns. If any inconsistency exists or arises between the
	terms of this Sixth Amendment and the terms of the Sublease, the terms of this Sixth Amendment shall prevail. This Sixth Amendment shall be governed by the laws of the State of New York. The recitals at the beginning of this Sixth Amendment are
	hereby incorporated as of fully set forth herein. Capitalized terms used herein but not defined shall have the meanings given such terms under the Sublease.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Section 6.3
<U>
	Counterparts
</U>
	. This Sixth Amendment may be executed in multiple counterparts, each of which shall constitute an original, with the same
	effect as if the signatures thereto were upon the same instrument. If any signature to this Sixth Amendment is delivered by facsimile transmission or by e-mail delivery of a portable document format (.pdf or similar format) data file, then such
	signature shall create a valid and binding obligation of the party executing (or on whose behalf such signature is executed) with the same force and effect as if such facsimile or &#147;.pdf&#146; signature page were an original thereof. This Sixth
	Amendment shall become effective when both Sublandlord and Subtenant have received a counterpart hereof signed by the other.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	4
</P>

	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, Sublandlord and Subtenant have executed this Sixth Amendment to Sublease as
	of the day and year first above written.
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	On the 8
<SUP STYLE="FONT-SIZE:85%; VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
	th
</SUP>
	day of February, in the year 2016, before me,
	the undersigned, a Notary Public in and for said state of New York, personally appeared William J. Stuart, personally known to me or proved to me on the basis of satisfactory evidence to be the individual whose name is subscribed to the within
	instrument and acknowledged to me that he/she executed the same in his/her capacity, and that by his/her signature on the instrument, the individual, or the entity upon behalf of whom the individual acted, executed the instrument, and that such
	individual made such appearance before the undersigned in Erie County, New York.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;

	On the 8th day of Feb. in the year 2016 before me, the undersigned, a Notary Public in and for said state of
	Minnesota, personally appeared Ann Brown, personally known to me or proved to me on the basis of satisfactory evidence to be the individual whose name is subscribed to the within instrument and acknowledged to me that he/she executed the same in
	his/her capacity, and that by his/her signature on the instrument, the individual, or the entity upon behalf of whom the individual acted, executed the instrument, and that such individual made such appearance before the undersigned in Anoka County,
	Minnesota.

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	6

<A NAME="eolPage159"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Landlord Consent to Sixth Amendment (Synacor)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	D&amp;S Capital Real Estate III, LLC, successor in interest by acquisition to Waterfront Associates, LLC, as successor by conversion to
	Waterfront Associates (&#147;
<B>
	Landlord
</B>
	&#148;), is the landlord under the Property Lease dated March&nbsp;13,1998, with Covidien LP, a Delaware limited partnership, as successor in interest to Ludlow Technical Products Corporation, formerly
	known as Graphic Controls Corporation (&#147;
<B>
	Sublandlord
</B>
	&#148;), as tenant, for that certain building containing approximately 102,816 rentable square feet of space and commonly known as Building No. 3, Waterfront Village Center, 40 La
	Riviere Drive, Buffalo, New York 14202 (the &#147;Building&#148;), which Property Lease was amended by that certain First Amendment to Lease dated April&nbsp;29,1998, that Second Amendment to Lease dated April&nbsp;21,1999, that Third Amendment to
	Lease dated July&nbsp;30,1999, and that Fourth Amendment to Lease dated December&nbsp;30, 2007 (as amended, the &#147;
<B>
	Lease
</B>
	&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Under that certain Sublease dated as of March&nbsp;3, 2006, as amended by that First Amendment to Sublease dated September&nbsp;25, 2006, that
	Second Amendment to Sublease dated February&nbsp;27, 2007, that Third Amendment to Sublease dated June&nbsp;30, 2010, that Fourth Amendment to Sublease (&#147;
<B>
	Fourth Amendment
</B>
	&#148;) dated May&nbsp;21, 2013 and that Fifth Amendment to
	Sublease (&#147;
<B>
	Fifth Amendment
</B>
	&#148;) dated July&nbsp;10, 2013 (collectively, the &#147;
<B>
	Sublease
</B>
	&#148;) by and between Sublandlord and Synacor, Inc., a Delaware corporation, as subtenant (&#147;
<B>
	Subtenant
</B>
	&#148;), Subtenant
	subleases a portion of the Building, which portion contains approximately 45,056 rentable square feet of space, is located on the first and third floors of the Building, and is defined as the &#147;Premises&#148; in the Sublease.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Subtenant and Sublandlord have now entered into that certain Sixth Amendment to Sublease dated as of February 8, 2016 (the &#147;
<B>
	Sixth
	Amendment
</B>
	&#148;). A copy of the Sixth Amendment is attached to this Landlord Consent. Under the Sixth Amendment, the Term of the Sublease is extended to the earlier of: (a) December&nbsp;31,2017, or (b) five days before the expiration or earlier
	termination, for any reason whatsoever, of the Lease, or (c) June&nbsp;30, 2017 if Subtenant exercises the early termination right set forth in the Sixth Amendment. Also under the Sixth Amendment, effective March&nbsp;31,2016, Subtenant is
	relinquishing all of the first floor space subleased by Subtenant consisting of 14,248 rentable square feet of space resulting in The area being subleased by Subtenant being reduced to 30,808 rentable square feet, all on the third floor of the
	Building.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Landlord hereby acknowledges and agrees that it has received and reviewed a copy of the Sixth Amendment. After review, Landlord
	consents to the provisions of the enclosed Sixth Amendment. This Landlord Consent shall not be deemed to constitute consent by the undersigned to any subletting other than that described in the Sixth Amendment.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<DIV CLASS="eolNewPage"></DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage160"></A>
<A NAME="D127163DEX10163_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_6"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.16.3
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	JOINDER
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	TO
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	LOAN AND SECURITY AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This JOINDER TO LOAN AND SECURITY AGREEMENT (this &#147;Agreement&#148;) is entered into this 13th day of April, 2015, by and among
	(a)&nbsp;SILICON VALLEY BANK (&#147;Bank&#148;), and (b)(i) SYNACOR, INC., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Existing Borrower&#148;), and (ii)&nbsp;NTV INTERNET HOLDINGS, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (&#147;New Borrower&#148;; and together
	with Existing Borrower, jointly and severally, individually and collectively, &#147;Borrower&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	R
<SMALL>
	ECITALS
</SMALL>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	A.
</B>
	Bank and Existing Borrower have entered into that certain Loan and Security Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;27, 2013, as
	amended by that certain First Amendment to Loan and Security Agreement dated as of October&nbsp;28, 2014, between Existing Borrower and Bank (as the same may from time to time be further amended, modified, supplemented or restated, the &#147;Loan
	Agreement&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	B.
</B>
	Bank has extended credit to Existing Borrower for the purposes permitted in the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	C.
</B>
	Existing Borrower, together with New Borrower, has requested that New Borrower join the obligations and liabilities of Existing
	Borrower to Bank pursuant to the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	D.
</B>
	Bank has agreed to so add New Borrower as Borrower under the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	A
<SMALL>
	GREEMENT
</SMALL>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Now, T
<SMALL>
	HEREFORE
</SMALL>
	,
</B>
	in consideration of the foregoing recitals and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and
	adequacy of which is hereby acknowledged, and intending to be legally bound, the parties hereto agree as follows:
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	1.
</B>
<B>
	Definitions.
</B>
	Capitalized terms used but not defined in this Agreement shall have the meanings given to them in the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	2.
</B>
<B>
	Joinder to Loan Agreement.
</B>
	New Borrower hereby joins the Loan Agreement and each of the other appropriate Loan Documents, and
	agrees to comply with and be bound by all of the terms, conditions and covenants of the Loan Agreement and each of the other appropriate Loan Documents as if New Borrower was originally named &#147;Borrower&#148; therein. Without limiting the
	generality of the preceding sentence, New Borrower hereby assumes and agrees to pay and perform when due all present and future indebtedness, liabilities and obligations of Borrower under the Loan Agreement, including, without limitation, the
	Obligations. From and after the date hereof, all references in the Loan Documents to &#147;Borrower&#148; shall be deemed to refer to and include each of Existing Borrower and New Borrower. Further, all present and future Obligations of Borrower
	shall be deemed to refer to all
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	1
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage161"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	present and future Obligations of both Existing Borrower and New Borrower. New Borrower acknowledges that the Obligations are due and owing to Bank from Borrowers including, without limitation,
	New Borrower, without any defense, offset or counterclaim of any kind or nature whatsoever as of the date hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3. Grant of Security
	Interest.
</B>
	New Borrower hereby grants Bank, to secure the payment and performance in full of all of the Obligations, a continuing security interest in, and pledges to Bank, New Borrower&#146;s Collateral, wherever located, whether now owned or
	hereafter acquired or arising, and all proceeds and products thereof. New Borrower represents, warrants, and covenants that the security interest granted by New Borrower herein is and shall at all times continue to be a first priority perfected
	security interest in the Collateral (subject only to Permitted Liens that expressly may have superior priority to Bank&#146;s Lien under the Loan Agreement). New Borrower hereby authorizes Bank to file financing statements, without notice to any
	Borrower, with all appropriate jurisdictions to perfect or protect Bank&#146;s interest or rights hereunder, including a notice that any disposition of the Collateral, by either any Borrower or any other Person, shall be deemed to violate the rights
	of Bank under the Code.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	4. Subrogation and Similar Rights.
</B>
	Each Borrower (in each case including, without limitation, New Borrower)
	waives any suretyship defenses available to it under the Code or any other applicable law, and any right to require Bank to: (i)&nbsp;proceed against any Borrower or any other person; (ii)&nbsp;proceed against or exhaust any security; or
	(iii)&nbsp;pursue any other remedy. Bank may exercise or not exercise any right or remedy it has against any Borrower or any security it holds (including the right to foreclose by judicial or non-judicial sale) without affecting any Borrower&#146;s
	liability. Notwithstanding any other provision of this Agreement, the Loan Agreement, or any other Loan Document, each Borrower irrevocably agrees that it will not exercise, until all Obligations (other than inchoate indemnity obligations) have been
	paid in full and this Agreement is terminated, any right that it may have at law or in equity (including, without limitation, any law subrogating such Borrower to the rights of Bank under the Loan Agreement) to seek contribution, indemnification or
	any other form of reimbursement from any other Borrower, or any other Person now or hereafter primarily or secondarily liable for any of the Obligations, for any payment made by such Borrower with respect to the Obligations in connection with the
	Loan Agreement or otherwise and all rights that it might have to benefit from, or to participate in, any security for the Obligations as a result of any payment made by such Borrower with respect to the Obligations in connection with the Loan
	Agreement or otherwise. Any agreement providing for indemnification, reimbursement or any other arrangement prohibited under this section shall be subordinated to the Obligations under the Loan Agreement. If any payment is made to a Borrower in
	contravention of this section, such Borrower shall hold such payment in trust for Bank and such payment shall be promptly delivered to Bank for application to the Obligations, whether matured or unmatured. Each Borrower may, acting singly, request
	Credit Extensions under the Loan Agreement. Each Borrower hereby appoints the other as agent for the other for all purposes under the Loan Agreement, including with respect to requesting Credit Extensions hereunder. Each Borrower shall be jointly
	and severally obligated to repay all Credit Extensions made under the Loan Agreement, regardless of which Borrower actually receives said Credit Extension, as if each Borrower directly received all Credit Extensions.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage162"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	5.
</B>
<B>
	Delivery of Documents.
</B>
	Borrower hereby agrees that the following documents shall
	be delivered to Bank prior to or concurrently with this Joinder Agreement, each in form and substance satisfactory to Bank:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) a limited
	liability company borrowing certificate for New Borrower with respect to New Borrower&#146;s certificate of formation, operating agreement, incumbency and resolutions authorizing the execution and delivery of this Agreement and the other documents
	required by Bank in connection with this Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) a long form certificate of the Secretary of State of Delaware certified within the
	past thirty (30)&nbsp;days as to New Borrower&#146;s legal existence and good standing;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c) a certificate of Good Standing/Foreign
	Qualification from each other state in which New Borrower is qualified to transact business, certified within the past thirty (30)&nbsp;days as to New Borrower&#146;s existence and good standing in such jurisdiction;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d) the results of UCC and other lien searches with respect to New Borrower indicating no Liens other than Permitted Liens and otherwise in
	form and substance satisfactory to Bank;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e) an Intellectual Property Security Agreement and completed exhibits thereto, and copies of
	searches with the United States Patent and Trademark Office and the United States Copyright Office for New Borrower;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(f) a Perfection
	Certificate for New Borrower;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(g) landlord&#146;s consents for each of New Borrower&#146;s leased locations are required by Bank; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(h) such other documents as Bank may reasonably request.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.
</B>
<B>
	Representations and Warranties.
</B>
	To induce Bank to enter into this Agreement, each Borrower hereby represents and warrants to
	Bank as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.1
</B>
	Immediately after giving effect to this Agreement (a)&nbsp;the representations and warranties contained in the
	Loan Documents are true, accurate and complete in all material respects as of the date hereof (except to the extent such representations and warranties relate to an earlier date, in which case they are true and correct as of such date), and
	(b)&nbsp;no Event of Default has occurred and is continuing;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.2
</B>
	Each Borrower has the power and authority to execute and deliver
	this Agreement and to perform its obligations under the Loan Agreement, as amended by this Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.3
</B>
	The organizational
	documents of Existing Borrower delivered to Bank on the Effective Date remain true, accurate and complete and have not been amended, supplemented or restated and are and continue to be in full force and effect;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage163"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.4
</B>
	The execution and delivery by each Borrower of this Agreement and the performance by
	each Borrower of its obligations under the Loan Agreement, as amended by this Agreement, have been duly authorized;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.5
</B>
	The
	execution and delivery by each Borrower of this Agreement and the performance by each Borrower of its obligations under the Loan Agreement, as amended by this Agreement, do not and will not contravene (a)&nbsp;any law or regulation binding on or
	affecting any Borrower, (b)&nbsp;any contractual restriction with a Person binding on any Borrower, (c)&nbsp;any order, judgment or decree of any court or other governmental or public body or authority, or subdivision thereof, binding on any
	Borrower, or (d)&nbsp;the organizational documents of any Borrower;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.6
</B>
	The execution and delivery by each Borrower of this
	Agreement and the performance by each Borrower of its obligations under the Loan Agreement, as amended by this Agreement, do not require any order, consent, approval, license, authorization or validation of, or filing, recording or registration
	with, or exemption by any governmental or public body or authority, or subdivision thereof, binding on each Borrower, except as already has been obtained or made; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.7
</B>
	This Agreement has been duly executed and delivered by each Borrower and is the binding obligation of each Borrower, enforceable
	against each Borrower in accordance with its terms, except as such enforceability may be limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, liquidation, moratorium or other similar laws of general application and equitable principles relating to or
	affecting creditors&#146; rights.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	7.
</B>
<B>
	Ratification of Intellectual Property Security Agreements.
</B>
	Existing Borrower hereby
	ratifies, confirms and reaffirms, all and singular, the terms and disclosures contained in that certain Intellectual Property Security Agreement between Existing Borrower and Bank, dated as of September&nbsp;27, 2013, and acknowledges, confirms and
	agrees that such Intellectual Property Security Agreement (a)&nbsp;contains an accurate and complete listing of all Intellectual Property Collateral, as defined in such Intellectual Property Security Agreement, and (b)&nbsp;shall remain in full
	force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	8.
</B>
<B>
	Ratification of Perfection Certificate.
</B>
	Existing Borrower hereby ratifies, confirms and reaffirms, all
	and singular, the terms and disclosures contained in a certain Perfection Certificate dated as of September&nbsp;27, 2013 and updated as of October&nbsp;28, 2014, previously delivered by Existing Borrower to Bank, and acknowledges, confirms and
	agrees the disclosures and information Existing Borrower provided to Bank in said Perfection Certificate have not changed, as of the date hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	9.
</B>
<B>
	Integration.
</B>
	This Agreement and the Loan Documents represent the entire agreement about this subject matter and supersede
	prior negotiations or agreements. All prior agreements, understandings, representations, warranties, and negotiations between the parties about the subject matter of this Agreement and the Loan Documents merge into this Agreement and the Loan
	Documents.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT; MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	4
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage164"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	10.
</B>
<B>
	Counterparts.
</B>
	This Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts and
	all of such counterparts taken together shall be deemed to constitute one and the same instrument.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	11. Effectiveness.
</B>
	This
	Agreement shall be deemed effective upon (a)&nbsp;the due execution and delivery to Bank of this Agreement by each party hereto, and (b)&nbsp;Borrower&#146;s payment of Bank&#146;s legal fees and expenses incurred in connection with this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">

<DIV CLASS="eolNewPage"></DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage166"></A>
<A NAME="D127163DEX10165_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_7"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<B>
	Exhibit 10.16.5
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	JOINDER
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	TO
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	LOAN AND SECURITY AGREEMENT
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This JOINDER TO LOAN AND SECURITY AGREEMENT (this &#147;Agreement&#148;) is entered into this 25th day of September, 2015, by and among
	(a)&nbsp;SILICON VALLEY BANK (&#147;Bank&#148;), and (b)(i) SYNACOR, INC., a Delaware corporation (&#147;Synacor&#148;), (ii)&nbsp;NTV INTERNET HOLDINGS, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (&#147;NTV&#148;; and together with Synacor, jointly
	and severally, individually and collectively, &#147;Existing Borrower&#148;), and (iii)&nbsp;SYNC HOLDINGS, LLC, a Delaware limited liability company (&#147;New Borrower&#148;; and together with Existing Borrower, jointly and severally, individually
	and collectively, &#147;Borrower&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	R
<SMALL>
	ECITALS
</SMALL>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	A.
</B>
	Bank and Existing Borrower have entered into that certain Loan and Security Agreement dated as of September&nbsp;27, 2013, as
	amended by that certain First Amendment to Loan and Security Agreement dated as of October&nbsp;28, 2014, between Existing Borrower and Bank (as the same may from time to time be further amended, modified, supplemented or restated, the &#147;Loan
	Agreement&#148;).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	B.
</B>
	Bank has extended credit to Existing Borrower for the purposes permitted in the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	C.
</B>
	Existing Borrower, together with New Borrower, has requested that New Borrower join the obligations and liabilities of Existing
	Borrower to Bank pursuant to the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	D.
</B>
	Bank has agreed to so add New Borrower as Borrower under the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	A
<SMALL>
	GREEMENT
</SMALL>
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	NOW, T
<SMALL>
	HEREFORE
</SMALL>
	,
</B>
	in consideration of the foregoing recitals and other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and
	adequacy of which is hereby acknowledged, and intending to be legally bound, the parties hereto agree as follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	1. Definitions.
</B>
	Capitalized terms used but not defined in this Agreement shall have the meanings given to them in the Loan Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	2. Joinder to
	Loan Agreement.
</B>
	New Borrower hereby joins the Loan Agreement and each of the other appropriate Loan Documents, and agrees to comply with and be bound by all of the terms, conditions and covenants of the Loan Agreement and each of the other
	appropriate Loan Documents as if New Borrower was originally named &#147;Borrower&#148; therein. Without limiting the generality of the preceding sentence, New Borrower hereby assumes and agrees to pay and perform when due all present and future
	indebtedness, liabilities and obligations of Borrower under the Loan Agreement, including, without limitation, the Obligations. From and after the date hereof, all references in the Loan Documents to &#147;Borrower&#148; shall be deemed to refer to
	and include each of Existing Borrower and New
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	1
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage167"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Borrower. Further, all present and future Obligations of Borrower shall be deemed to refer to all present and future Obligations of both Existing Borrower and New Borrower. New Borrower
	acknowledges that the Obligations are due and owing to Bank from Borrowers including, without limitation, New Borrower, without any defense, offset or counterclaim of any kind or nature whatsoever as of the date hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	3. Grant of Security Interest.
</B>
	New Borrower hereby grants Bank, to secure the payment and performance in full of all of the Obligations,
	a continuing security interest in, and pledges to Bank, New Borrower&#146;s Collateral, wherever located, whether now owned or hereafter acquired or arising, and all proceeds and products thereof. New Borrower represents, warrants, and covenants
	that the security interest granted by New Borrower herein is and shall at all times continue to be a first priority perfected security interest in the Collateral (subject only to Permitted Liens that expressly may have superior priority to
	Bank&#146;s Lien under the Loan Agreement). New Borrower hereby authorizes Bank to file financing statements, without notice to any Borrower, with all appropriate jurisdictions to perfect or protect Bank&#146;s interest or rights hereunder,
	including a notice that any disposition of the Collateral, by either any Borrower or any other Person, shall be deemed to violate the rights of Bank under the Code.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	4. Subrogation and Similar Rights.
</B>
	Each Borrower (in each case including, without limitation, New Borrower) waives any suretyship
	defenses available to it under the Code or any other applicable law, and any right to require Bank to: (i)&nbsp;proceed against any Borrower or any other person; (ii)&nbsp;proceed against or exhaust any security; or (iii)&nbsp;pursue any other
	remedy. Bank may exercise or not exercise any right or remedy it has against any Borrower or any security it holds (including the right to foreclose by judicial or non-judicial sale) without affecting any Borrower&#146;s liability. Notwithstanding
	any other provision of this Agreement, the Loan Agreement, or any other Loan Document, each Borrower irrevocably agrees that it will not exercise, until all Obligations (other than inchoate indemnity obligations) have been paid in full and this
	Agreement is terminated, any right that it may have at law or in equity (including, without limitation, any law subrogating such Borrower to the rights of Bank under the Loan Agreement) to seek contribution, indemnification or any other form of
	reimbursement from any other Borrower, or any other Person now or hereafter primarily or secondarily liable for any of the Obligations, for any payment made by such Borrower with respect to the Obligations in connection with the Loan Agreement or
	otherwise and all rights that it might have to benefit from, or to participate in, any security for the Obligations as a result of any payment made by such Borrower with respect to the Obligations in connection with the Loan Agreement or otherwise.
	Any agreement providing for indemnification, reimbursement or any other arrangement prohibited under this section shall be subordinated to the Obligations under the Loan Agreement. If any payment is made to a Borrower in contravention of this
	section, such Borrower shall hold such payment in trust for Bank and such payment shall be promptly delivered to Bank for application to the Obligations, whether matured or unmatured. Each Borrower may, acting singly, request Credit Extensions under
	the Loan Agreement. Each Borrower hereby appoints the other as agent for the other for all purposes under the Loan Agreement, including with respect to requesting Credit Extensions hereunder. Each Borrower shall be jointly and severally obligated to
	repay all Credit Extensions made under the Loan Agreement, regardless of which Borrower actually receives said Credit Extension, as if each Borrower directly received all Credit Extensions.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	2
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage168"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	5. Delivery of Documents.
</B>
	Borrower hereby agrees that the following documents shall be
	delivered to Bank prior to or concurrently with this Joinder Agreement, each in form and substance satisfactory to Bank:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(a) a limited
	liability company borrowing certificate for New Borrower with respect to New Borrower&#146;s certificate of formation, operating agreement, incumbency and resolutions authorizing the execution and delivery of this Agreement and the other documents
	required by Bank in connection with this Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(b) a long form certificate of the Secretary of State of Delaware certified within the
	past thirty (30)&nbsp;days as to New Borrower&#146;s legal existence and good standing;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(c) a certificate of Good Standing/Foreign
	Qualification from each other state in which New Borrower is qualified to transact business, certified within the past thirty (30)&nbsp;days as to New Borrower&#146;s existence and good standing in such jurisdiction;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(d) the results of UCC and other lien searches with respect to New Borrower indicating no Liens other than Permitted Liens and otherwise in
	form and substance satisfactory to Bank;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(e) an Intellectual Property Security Agreement and completed exhibits thereto, and copies of
	searches with the United States Patent and Trademark Office and the United States Copyright Office for New Borrower;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(f) a Perfection
	Certificate for New Borrower;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(g) landlord&#146;s consents for each of New Borrower&#146;s leased locations are required by Bank; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	(h) such other documents as Bank may reasonably request.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6. Representations and Warranties.
</B>
	To induce Bank to enter into this Agreement, each Borrower hereby represents and warrants to Bank as
	follows:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.1
</B>
	Immediately after giving effect to this Agreement (a)&nbsp;the representations and warranties contained in the Loan
	Documents are true, accurate and complete in all material respects as of the date hereof (except to the extent such representations and warranties relate to an earlier date, in which case they are true and correct as of such date), and (b)&nbsp;no
	Event of Default has occurred and is continuing;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.2
</B>
	Each Borrower has the power and authority to execute and deliver this
	Agreement and to perform its obligations under the Loan Agreement, as amended by this Agreement;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.3
</B>
	The organizational documents
	of Existing Borrower delivered to Bank on the Effective Date remain true, accurate and complete and have not been amended, supplemented or restated and are and continue to be in full force and effect;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage169"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.4
</B>
	The execution and delivery by each Borrower of this Agreement and the performance by
	each Borrower of its obligations under the Loan Agreement, as amended by this Agreement, have been duly authorized;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.5
</B>
	The
	execution and delivery by each Borrower of this Agreement and the performance by each Borrower of its obligations under the Loan Agreement, as amended by this Agreement, do not and will not contravene (a)&nbsp;any law or regulation binding on or
	affecting any Borrower, (b)&nbsp;any contractual restriction with a Person binding on any Borrower, (c)&nbsp;any order, judgment or decree of any court or other governmental or public body or authority, or subdivision thereof, binding on any
	Borrower, or (d)&nbsp;the organizational documents of any Borrower;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.6
</B>
	The execution and delivery by each Borrower of this
	Agreement and the performance by each Borrower of its obligations under the Loan Agreement, as amended by this Agreement, do not require any order, consent, approval, license, authorization or validation of, or filing, recording or registration
	with, or exemption by any governmental or public body or authority, or subdivision thereof, binding on each Borrower, except as already has been obtained or made; and
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:8%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	6.7
</B>
	This Agreement has been duly executed and delivered by each Borrower and is the binding obligation of each Borrower, enforceable
	against each Borrower in accordance with its terms, except as such enforceability may be limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, liquidation, moratorium or other similar laws of general application and equitable principles relating to or
	affecting creditors&#146; rights.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	7. Ratification of Intellectual Property Security Agreements.
</B>
	Existing Borrower hereby ratifies,
	confirms and reaffirms, all and singular, the terms and disclosures contained in (a)&nbsp;that certain Intellectual Property Security Agreement between Synacor and Bank, dated as of September&nbsp;27, 2013, and acknowledges, confirms and agrees that
	such Intellectual Property Security Agreement (i)&nbsp;contains an accurate and complete listing of all Intellectual Property Collateral, as defined in such Intellectual Property Security Agreement, and (ii)&nbsp;shall remain in full force and
	effect, and (b)&nbsp;that certain Intellectual Property Security Agreement between NTV and Bank, dated as of April&nbsp;13, 2015, and acknowledges, confirms and agrees that such Intellectual Property Security Agreement (i)&nbsp;contains an accurate
	and complete listing of all Intellectual Property Collateral, as defined in such Intellectual Property Security Agreement, and (ii)&nbsp;shall remain in full force and effect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	8. Ratification of Perfection Certificate.
</B>
	Existing Borrower hereby ratifies, confirms and reaffirms, all and singular, the terms and
	disclosures contained in (a)&nbsp;a certain Perfection Certificate dated as of September&nbsp;27, 2013 and updated as of October&nbsp;28, 2014, previously delivered by Synacor to Bank, and acknowledges, confirms and agrees the disclosures and
	information Synacor provided to Bank in said Perfection Certificate have not changed, as of the date hereof, except as updated as of the date hereof, and (b)&nbsp;a certain Perfection Certificate dated as of April&nbsp;13, 2015, previously delivered
	by NTV to Bank, and acknowledges, confirms and agrees the disclosures and information NTV provided to Bank in said Perfection Certificate have not changed, as of the date hereof.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	4
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage170"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	9. Integration.
</B>
	This Agreement and the Loan Documents represent the entire agreement about
	this subject matter and supersede prior negotiations or agreements. All prior agreements, understandings, representations, warranties, and negotiations between the parties about the subject matter of this Agreement and the Loan Documents merge into
	this Agreement and the Loan Documents.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	10. Counterparts.
</B>
	This Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts and all of
	such counterparts taken together shall be deemed to constitute one and the same instrument.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	11. Effectiveness.
</B>
	This Agreement shall
	be deemed effective upon (a)&nbsp;the due execution and delivery to Bank of this Agreement by each party hereto, and (b)&nbsp;Borrower&#146;s payment of Bank&#146;s legal fees and expenses incurred in connection with this Agreement.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	[Signature page follows.]
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
